text: Purina has always been known for making quality dog food and this is no exception.  My Dog absolutely loves this and immediately goes for his food dish every time he hears the bag move. The 15.5 pound bag comes with a handy zip lock so no more mess, and it's easy to store as well. The pieces are big and meaty and impossible for any dog to resist! Purina Beneful is 100% complete and balanced nutrition with wholesome grains and real beef, accented with vitamin-rich vegetables, and besides their original flavor it also comes in a variety of other formula's specifically for your special pup.
